roleset.name: swelter
roleset.note: SWELTER-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from swelter.01-v)

example.name: from Google
example.text: The group waited inside for almost an hours while the press contingent sweltered outside in the muggy, tropical heat of a typicalManagua day.
example.arg: outside in the muggy, tropical heat of a typical Managua day
